name: Rock-It (Pixelbyte Studios)
description:
Guide a rocket to the green goal zone, but don't touch anything else or ... boom! Get to the goal quickly, watch out for enemiy rockets, and adjust your heading when cruising through control jamming zones.


Controls

  • Thrust: W or Up Arrow
  • Rotate: A/D or Left/Right Arrow (thrust is required to rotate)
  • K: Restart level
  • M: Toggle Music
